title: College Football Fans Will Score Big With Special Package From Scottsdale Marriott Suites Old Town
text:
Scottsdale Marriott Suites Old Town
Scottsdale all-suite hotel in Old Town offers deluxe accommodations, free breakfast and team merchandise for visitors in town to see their team take on Arizona State University at Sun Devil Stadium
SCOTTSDALE, Ariz. , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- College football fans visiting Sun Devil Stadium to see their favorite team take on Arizona State University can book a winning stay that's comfortable and affordable at Scottsdale Marriott Suites Old Town .
Fanatics looking for an Old Town Scottsdale hotel can take advantage of major savings with the College Football Game Package . The deal includes deluxe accommodations from $159 to $199 per night plus breakfast for two, two bottles of water and peanuts and spirit merchandise supporting the visiting team.
The Sun Devils face the USC Trojans on Sept. 26 , Colorado Buffaloes on Oct. 10 , Oregon Ducks on Oct. 29 , Washington Huskies on Nov. 14 and Arizona Wildcats on Nov. 21 .
Whatever side of the 50 yard line visitors are seated on, they will appreciate the hotel's convenient location, just 6 miles from the stadium in the heart of Scottsdale's entertainment district full of bars, restaurants, nightclubs and shopping.
Get in the football spirit before or after the big game at the hotel's 3 rd Avenue Grill , serving up fresh American-style cuisine with a southwestern flair plus a variety of handcrafted cocktails from the full bar. Revelers wanting to keep the celebration going after hours can head to their suite and take advantage of the wet bar. For breakfast, the Scottsdale restaurant offers everything from fresh seasonal fruit to Belgian waffles, eggs benedict, hash browns, steak and eggs, french toast and pancakes. Starbucks coffee also is served.
Weary fans can head straight to their tech-friendly suite that offers comfy bedding atop thick mattresses for a sound night's sleep. Large marble bathrooms give guests a place to wash off face paint or prepare for a new day. Separate living and seating areas provide visitors a home-away-from-home feel. High-speed Internet service and large flat-panel TVs also are available to stay connected to the stats of players.
Other thoughtful amenities at the hotel include a lobby designed for socializing, outdoor swimming pool and a whirlpool to wind down in the evenings.
To score savings with the special seasonal package, use promotional code SPO when making reservations online or by calling 1-800-228-9290. The offer is valid Wednesday through Sunday through Nov. 22, 2015 .
About Scottsdale Marriott Suites Old Town
Scottsdale Marriott Suites Old Town at 7325 E. 3 rd Ave. in Scottsdale, AZ , is near Sun Devil Stadium, Scottsdale Fashion Square, Scottsdale Stadium and Downtown Scottsdale . The hotel boasts 8 floors with 243 suites, 13 meeting rooms with 8,755 square feet of total meeting space, 3 rd Avenue Grill, Starbucks coffee house, fitness center, outdoor pool and whirlpool. For information, visit www.marriott.com/PHXST or call 1-480-945-1550.
